research_question: Can Tuna-9 produce a meaningful QAOA landscape for MaxCut? This is the first optimization algorithm on Tuna-9. For a 4-node path graph, the classical optimum is 3 edges cut. Does the hardware landscape show structure matching the ideal gamma~0.39, beta~0.79 optimum?
description: QAOA depth-1 on 4-node path [5,2,4,6]. All edges physically connected (91.4%, 92.3%, 93.5% Bell fidelity). 5x5 gamma/beta sweep = 25 circuits, 4096 shots each. First optimization algorithm on Tuna-9 hardware.
